prompts.title: Professional Email Response
prompts.body:
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate you taking the time to contact us regarding [specific topic/issue].

[Your main response addressing their inquiry]

Please let me know if you have any additional questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.

Best regards,
[Your name]

variables.name: Your main response addressing their inquiry
variables.label: Main Response

prompts.title: Meeting Follow-up
prompts.body:
Hi [Name],

Thank you for the productive meeting today. Here's a summary of what we discussed:

• [Key point 1]
• [Key point 2]
• [Key point 3]

Next steps:
- [Action item 1] - Due: [Date]
- [Action item 2] - Due: [Date]

Please let me know if you need any clarification or have questions.

Best regards,
[Your name]

prompts.title: Project Status Update
prompts.body:
Project: [Project Name]
Status: [Current Status]

Progress Update:
[Detailed progress description]

Key Achievements:
• [Achievement 1]
• [Achievement 2]

Challenges & Risks:
• [Challenge/Risk 1]
• [Challenge/Risk 2]

Next Milestone: [Date]

Questions/Blockers:
[Any questions or blockers that need attention]

variables.name: Any questions or blockers that need attention
variables.label: Questions/Blockers

prompts.title: Customer Support Response
prompts.body:
Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for contacting [Company Name] support. I understand your concern about [specific issue], and I'm here to help resolve this for you.

[Your solution or next steps]

If you continue to experience issues, please don't hesitate to reach out again. Your satisfaction is our priority.

Best regards,
[Your name]
[Company Name] Support Team

prompts.title: Code Review Feedback
prompts.body:
Code Review for [Feature/Component Name]

Overall Assessment: [Positive/Needs Improvement/Major Issues]

Strengths:
• [Strength 1]
• [Strength 2]

Areas for Improvement:
• [Improvement 1]
• [Improvement 2]

Specific Comments:
[Line-by-line or section-specific feedback]

Recommendations:
• [Recommendation 1]
• [Recommendation 2]

Status: [Approved/Approved with Changes/Needs Revision]

prompts.title: Improve Email Tone
prompts.body: You are an assistant that improves emails to be friendly, happy, and professional. Before rewriting, confirm you have: the original email text, the intended audience, and the desired outcome. If anything is missing, ask up to 3 short clarifying questions. Then rewrite the email with correct grammar, clear structure, and a warm but professional tone. Output in a standardized format with 'Subject', 'Body', and 'Key Changes Made'.

prompts.title: Summarize Email Thread with Action Items
prompts.body: You are an assistant that reviews an email thread and produces a concise summary. Before starting, confirm you have: the full thread, context for the project or topic, and any existing deadlines. If information is missing, ask up to 3 clarifying questions. Then output a standardized summary including: 1) Key points, 2) Action items with owners and due dates, 3) Tone analysis (e.g., cooperative, frustrated, neutral) for each participant.

prompts.title: Business Overview and Market Analysis
prompts.body: You are an assistant that analyzes a business and its products. Before proceeding, confirm you have: the business name, description or website, and product/service list. If data is incomplete, ask up to 3 clarifying questions. Then produce a standardized overview with: 1) Years in business, 2) Target markets, 3) Primary competitors, 4) Product/service summary, 5) Key observations or opportunities.
